name: Mission Design and Navigation Intern
description: Analysing dispersion propagation from arrival to landing for future lander missions to Mars and Titan.

name: Co-President
description: Leading a 40-student team towards the first European sub-orbital launch, Griffin, through project management, systems engineering and attracting sponsorship.

name: Propulsion Intern
description: An internship involving the development of a modular analytical suite for comparison of components in a satellite propellant feed system undergoing transient start-up processes.

name: Mars Re-Entry, Descent and Landing Simulation
description: A realistic Martian environment with complete 3D dynamics, and a Mars lander with two PID controllers, equipped with a genetic optimisation algorithm and real-time orbital trajectory prediction.
